articles.description: The Rajasthan Royals' director of cricket on the making of Jos Buttler's purple patch this IPL season and the reason he's found success where other batters haven't
articles.content: "Jos is brilliant at reading the game, he knows how to switch back and forth between batting normally and power-hitting"  •  BCCI

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Michael Hussey recalls seeing CSK captain MS Dhoni get emotional - Hindustan Times
articles.description: MS Dhoni, who was the most expensive buy at the inaugural IPL auction in February 2008, has been the captain of CSK since the beginning of the IPL.
articles.content: In the 15-season journey of the IPL, MS Dhoni has been synonymous with Chennai Super Kings, leading the franchise to four IPL titles. He captained the team right from its inception in the year 2008, … [+2640 chars]

articles.title: ‘Depends on the combination we put out’ – Mahela Jayawardene on chances of Arjun Tendulkar’s IPL debut - CricTracker
articles.description: MI head coach Mahela Jayawardene has said that the Mumbai Indians might give a chance to Arjun Tendulkar in the next game
articles.content:
Arjun Tendulkar. (Photo Source: Twitter)
Mumbai Indians became the first team to be knocked out of IPL 2022 after eight losses in a row. Nonetheless, they went on to beat Rajasthan Royals last week … [+1575 chars]
